quick_start_0: Simple AI operates using a command interface, shortcuts and gestures. Commands all begin with `:` (half-width colon).⌨️
quick_start_1: Before starting to use please register as a `user` with command `:user add [username] [email] [password?]`. For example, `:user add john john@example.com ********`. Note: Do not include the brackets in your command.✅
quick_start_2: To log in, use the command `:login [username] [password]`.
quick_start_3: If you forgot your password, reset it using the command `:user reset pass [username] [email]`.🆘
quick_start_4: To access the documentation and confirm usage, click the dot (•) in the screen corner.📄
quick_start_5: To navigate between chat histories, use the `⬅️` and `➡️` arrow keys. (Or swipe left and right on smartphones.📱) To navigate between `sessions`, use the `⬆️` and `⬇️` arrow keys.
quick_start_6: After logging in, use `:use "WolframAlpha"` to enable enhanced mathematics.🏛️ Tips: use the `Tab` key to autocomplete.💡
quick_start_7: Switch to fullscreen with `F11` (⌃F11 for macOS). For split screen, use `Ctrl+|`.🖥️
github_issues: You can visit our GitHub issues (<1><2>link</2></1>) to report any issues you encounter, share your ideas, or contribute to the project.
discord_server: You can join our Discord server (<1><2>link</2></1>) to discuss with other users.
email_support: You can contact us via email `<1><2>support@simple-ai.io</2></1>`.
email_support_privacy_policy: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy, please contact us at `<1><2>support@simple-ai.io</2></1>`.
email_support_subscriptions: * For enterprise use, please contact us at `<1><2>support@simple-ai.io</2></1>`.
